comment.author: 59419369@N05
comment._content:
As per David Stuart-Mogg in the Society of Malawi journal Vol 59 No 2 of 2006, the man on the back left is Fred Moir. On the far right standing is John Moir. The youthful looking person next to Fred is Alexander Hetherwick and next to him is possibly Henry Henderson. 

The photo appears in Consul Hawes' album in 1886 - it is not clear if Hawes appears in the photo.
